definition: erhua variant of 錢串|钱串[qian2 chuan4]
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

to string together/to skewer/to connect wrongly/to gang up/to rove/string/bunch/skewer/classifier for things that are strung together, or in a bunch, or in a row: string of, bunch of, series of/to make a swift or abrupt linear movement (like a bead on an abacus)/to move across
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
to join jade annuli/fig. to combine two good things
many things arranged together, or connected together/to go on limitlessly
lunar caustic (fused silver nitrate, shaped into a stick and used as a cauterizing agent)
homophone group (group of homophone characters, in a rhyme book)
Wang Xiaofeng (1944-), fourth governor of Hainan
erhua variant of 八哥[ba1 ge1]
